Page Locations¶

This class is essentially a way to store multiple pieminer.Element objects.

class pieminer.PageLocations¶

The base class for locating article elements on a site.

Some fields are gathered in a default way, based on standard metadata: - title - authors - doi - abstract - date_publication

These can be overwritten if required.
